summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FriendSnap MVP - friendship app for adults with intellectual disabilities. Backend APIs are 100% functional. Frontend user flows work correctly with excellent accessibility features. Only minor issue found with Help modal functionality.

ui_bugs.issue: Help button click redirects to landing page instead of opening modal
ui_bugs.details: Help button is visible on all pages but clicking it causes navigation to landing page rather than opening the help modal dialog

passed_tests: Backend API health checks (15/15 endpoints working)
User registration flow (nickname, password, avatar selection)
User login flow with proper authentication
Landing page with logo, welcome text, Get Started and Login buttons
TTS (Text-to-speech) buttons present throughout the app
Home page shows user info, Add Photo and Find Friends buttons
Add Photo page with upload zone and rules reminder
Friends page with Suggestions and My Friends tabs
Profile page with logout option and user info
Bottom navigation works on all protected pages
Avatar selection grid with 12 available avatars
Photo upload with AI moderation integration
Friend matching based on photo interests

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (1 minor UI issue out of ~20 features tested)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Help modal functionality - the help button should open a modal dialog instead of redirecting to landing page. Check HelpModal component integration and event handling.
